title: Broken Lines + The Dead and the Drunk Expansion
body:
Broken Lines + The Dead and the Drunk Expansion


Genres/Tags: Strategy, Tactics, Isometric, 3D, Simultaneous turns, Turn-based
Companies: PortaPlay, Super.com
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 3.7 GB
Repack Size: 1.8 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by Gamesdrive, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Broken.Lines.The.Dead.and.the.Drunk-CODEX ISO release: codex-broken.lines.the.dead.and.the.drunk.iso (3,947,954,176 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.7 to 1.8 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-3 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 6.1 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Your squad has crash-landed behind enemy lines, in the heart of an alternate history Eastern Europe. With no intel or leadership to support them, these soldiers must fight their way back home before the horrors of war break them. Teamwork and strategy are paramount…

Each soldier has their own personality and ideas on what needs to happen next. Some want to investigate what caused the crash that left them in hostile territory, while others want to lay low and wait for rescue. There are even whispers of desertion.

You are the “unseen hand” that guides this ragtag group of soldiers to safety and possible rescue. Whether it’s as simple a choice as to which way to go next, or something as serious as how to engage their mysterious foes, every decision you make is serious and significant.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous Broken Lines repack.
